title: Simplify Development Task Interface
description: Remove unnecessary UI elements from the Development Task interface to create a cleaner, more focused user experience by eliminating Branch, PR status, and Rebase links.
iWant: a simplified Development Task interface without cluttered Branch, PR, and Rebase elements
soThat: I can focus on essential task information without visual distractions and navigate more efficiently
acceptanceCriteria: Branch information is removed from Development Task display
PR created and ready for development status is hidden from interface
Rebase link is eliminated from task actions
Remaining task elements maintain proper spacing and alignment
